ext_descriptions.ext_description: A derived_zone_shape_class lists the types of the derived zone shape class.
specifies that type of the derived zone shape class is area;
specifies that type of the derived zone shape class is edge;

A Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship is a product structure relationship that may be represented in a geometric context for the purpose of deriving a 2D or 3D representation of the intersection of a terminal interface.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship is dependent on the the existence of the that specifies the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship as its . There shall be no more than one for a Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies the role of a for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies the role of a for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies the role of a for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
specifies the role of a for the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.
The combination of interface_plane and mating_zone shall be unique within a population of the Connection_zone_bare_die_interface_plane_relationship.

ext_description.p: A Bare_die is a type of . A Bare_die is used to describe the physical shape and function of a semiconductor device.
ext_description.note: In the PCA domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be installed into an occurrence of a to realize a , an occurrence of which is then mounted in the assembly. In this role of performing a function, a Bare_die has terminals.

In the PCB domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be installed into the design of an to realize an embedded component. In this role, the external surfaces of the Bare_die will be important as they form part of the location information for the occurrence.

A Bare_die implements electrical functionality. It is not necessary to exchange Bare_die information for parts such as molded or ceramic resistors where there is not a separately identifiable and common industry understanding of a die.
In the PCA domain an occurrence of a Bare_die may be mounted directly onto the occurrence of a usage view of a PCB.
The existence of oxide or other thin contaminate protection is considered normal for a Bare_die.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Bare_die is dependent on the existence of the that is also a standard orientation reference for assembly purposes for the Bare_die. The is simulating a mounting surface.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Bare_die is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Bare_die as its . There shall be two or more for a Bare_die.
specifies the role of the for the Bare_die.

specifies one role of the for the Bare_die. The maximum_material_condition_centroid_location is the center of mass for a bare die in the state that contains the most material. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies the role of the for the Bare_die. The maximum_height_above_seating_plane is the largest extent of the Bare_die above the die_seating_plane. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies one role of the for the Bare_die. The least_material_condition_centroid_location is the center of mass for a bare die in the minimum material state. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
There shall be no more than one that references the Bare_die as a .
The die_seating_plane shall be a .

The of Bare_die_edge_segment_surface shall be the same as one of composed_surface.

A Bare_die_template_terminal is a type of .

ext_description.p: specifies the of the Bare_die_template_terminal. The external_connection_area is the area on the surface of a to which an electrically conducting material shall be attached to access the electrical functionality of the . There may be more than one for a Bare_die_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If the data is available in the source system, it shall be supplied.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Bare_die_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Bare_die_template_terminal is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Bare_die_template_terminal as its .
The type of material shall be .

ext_description.p: A Bare_die_terminal is a type of and a type of . A Bare_die_terminal is the surface area on a that corresponds to the functional terminal on that .

the other instance of Shape_element that takes part in the relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent upon the other, this attribute shall be the dependent one.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Bare_die_top_surface is a type of .
A Guided_wave_bare_die_terminal is a type of used with guided waves in high frequency or fiber-optic applications.
the text that provides further information about Guided_wave_bare_die_terminal. It shall be equal to 'guided wave bare die terminal'.

A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal is a type of . A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal may be a or additionally may be a . The associated_definition specifies the to which the Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal provides electrical access. A Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal does not include location or shape information.
specifies the role of the for the Minimally_defined_bare_die_terminal.
